menu.name: Classic BBQ Ribs
menu.description: Tender, slow-cooked ribs basted in our signature BBQ sauce.

menu.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
menu.description: Shredded pork piled high on a toasted bun with coleslaw.

menu.name: Texas Brisket Platter
menu.description: Sliced Texas-style brisket with a side of beans and cornbread.

menu.name: BBQ Chicken Wings
menu.description: Crispy chicken wings smothered in BBQ sauce, served with ranch dip.

menu.name: Vegetarian BBQ Burger
menu.description: Grilled veggie patty topped with BBQ sauce, lettuce, and tomato.

menu.name: BBQ Pork Sausages
menu.description: Juicy pork sausages grilled to perfection, served with BBQ sauce.

menu.name: Hickory Smoked Pulled Chicken
menu.description: Tender pulled chicken infused with hickory smoke flavor, piled high on a bun.

menu.name: Spicy BBQ Shrimp Skewers
menu.description: Jumbo shrimp skewers grilled with a spicy BBQ glaze and served with rice.

menu.name: BBQ Beef Brisket Tacos
menu.description: Sliced beef brisket stuffed into soft tortillas with slaw and BBQ drizzle.

menu.name: Grilled Corn on the Cob
menu.description: Fresh corn on the cob grilled with butter and BBQ seasoning.
